name: STR: shoot the robot
description:
this is FPS game that in space ! and this game have 2 level, i will update it and it will take a few months, if you like this game comment and rate this game 

enemy 

enemy that named "robot" and "Turret Robot" 

robot info : so robot is patrol around the level and have tiny damage

 turret robot info : turret robot will stay in 1 place but turret robot have big damage 

weapons 

you will have 3 weapons but when you start the level you will have 1 you have to find other 2 weapons 

gun 1

when you start the level you will get this weapons and this weapons have not to little damaged

gun 2

this weapons is big, this weapons have 2 circle bullet but have big damage 

gun 3 

the last weapons is gun 3 this weapons similar with gun 1 but have more bullet

this game is for windows, mac and, linux( but specialy for windows)
